channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CA

item.title: Report X-2025041280
item.description:
Report X-2025041280

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-18T21:15:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-28
  • City: PORT CHICAGO
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNION PACIFIC RAILROAD COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 3000
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Responded to citizen report of a constant release from Cryogenic tank car. inside the fittings compartment, the PRV activated and failed to reseat properly and caused a release.
